item.title: Program 1
item.description: This is an INDIVIDUAL Assignment (Do not collaborate) Submit a PDF with your work on iLearn. You will find the “man” command to be very useful. Make sure your Raspberry PI is up. Open a terminal, run the ifconfig command and record the output. Submit the output as a screenshot (5pts) Include the following information for the eth0 interface IP address, Ethernet Address, netmask, and MTU (20pts) Run ping between two PIs and record the output.
